name: Node Express Bootcamp
summary: Learn Node.js by building real application with Node, Express, MongoDB
description: Node.js is the best technology for you to learn right now, so Are you ready to dive it? Welcome to Node.js, Express and MongoDB Bootcamp, this course will be a huge help to be a backend developer. This course will be a perfect teacher to teach you from a beginner to an advanced and highly qualified Node.js developer. It contains Restful API, CRUD operations with MongoDB, MVC architecture, Authorization, and Security. By building this wonderful project, you will learn all the skills you need to plan, build and implement your own modern back-end applications with Node.js and related technologies.

name: Learn SCSS, CSS Grid and Flexbox
summary: Learn latest trend front-end technology like SCSS, CSS Grid, Flexbox
description: Welcome to Advanced CSS and Sass, the most advanced, the most modern, and the most complete CSS course on the internet. It's everything you want in an advanced CSS course, and more. You will learn complex CSS animations, advanced responsive design techniques, flexbox layouts, Sass, CSS architecture, fundamental CSS concepts, and so much more. Like in all my courses, you will build beautiful and carefully designed projects, that will make you proud of yourself and leave you ready to build complex projects on your own.

name: Build Web App with Vue JS and SQLIte
summary: Master Vue.js(Babel, NPM, Webpack, Vue router, Vuex, Axios, Express)
description: Vue.js is an open-source Model–view–viewmodel JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications. This course will cover powerful framework with Vue.js and Express. You will start by setting up the development environment and learning some of the essential concepts for building applications. This project contains register, login, jwt authentication, validator, searching, bookmark and crud data.

name: Master ASP.NET MVC
summary: Learn C# and .Net framework to build real world website
